thread.title: Parx Casino wants to add 220 slot machines
thread.title_full: Parx Casino wants to add 220 slot machines

author: Harold Brubaker,
title: Parx Casino wants to add 220 slot machines
text:
Greenwood Gaming & Entertainment Inc. plans to expand the gaming floor at Parx Casino, in Bensalem, by 15 percent, to 176,592 square feet, if it gets approval at the Pennsylvania Gaming Control Board's meeting Wednesday in Harrisburg.
The plan calls for adding 220 slot machines, a 6.7 percent increase, according to Greenwood's petition filed last month.
The number of table games would increase to 182 from 168, or 8 percent. A Parx spokeswoman did not respond to a request for additional information, such as how much Greenwood will spend on the expansion and how long it will take.
